content:
Read this informational text:

"Recycling is very important for everyone. When we recycle paper and plastic, it saves trees and reduces waste. Many people are learning about the importance of recycling and how it can make a positive difference in our lives and community."

According to the passage, why is recycling important?
options: It saves trees and reduces waste
correctAnswer: It saves trees and reduces waste
subject: Reading
explanation: The passage explains that recycling saves trees and reduces waste.

"Exercise is very important for everyone. When we play sports and stay active, it keeps our bodies healthy and strong. Many people are learning about the importance of exercise and how it can make a positive difference in our lives and community."

According to the passage, why is exercise important?
options: It keeps our bodies healthy and strong
correctAnswer: It keeps our bodies healthy and strong
subject: Reading
explanation: The passage explains that exercise keeps our bodies healthy and strong.
